contact.title: Contact me
contact.body: Leave me a message, I will call you back
contact.discret: You can also send me a mail at this address :

who.part1: Hello ! Benjamin, 25 years old, professional pianist and keyboardist.
who.part2: I learned music theory and piano with private teachers from the age of 7, playing classical and modern music.
who.part3: I became a professional pianist in 2019, by being admitted to the music school 'EF2M' in Tourcoing. During the 2 years of professional studies, I developed my musicality, my musical theory, and my piano/keyboard practice by studying contemporary music (pop, rock, blues, jazz...), surrounded by experienced and renowned teachers.
who.part4: Today, I would like to share my knowledge and experience by offering private lessons.

what.part1: I offer you a personalised, fun programme, according to your wishes and your level.
what.part2: Because it is personal, this programme is adapted to children and adults.
what.part3: Different styles can be covered (pop, rock, blues, classical, film music, introduction to jazz...), to allow you to play pieces that you like.
what.part4: We can work on several methods to learn the piano: picking up a piece by ear, or the traditional way with a score. Together, we will discover the technique and the basis of music theory, to allow you to be autonomous on a piano.
what.part5: If you wish to go further in the understanding of music, we will develop music theory, harmony, ear training... The objective is to learn while having fun and enjoying the piano.
what.part6: I offer two types of lessons: 30 minutes or 1 hour. Courses in french or english. Do not hesitate to contact me so that we can define what suits you best.
